author: crossley
msg: The OASIS XML Catalog DTD needs to be loaded early by Cocoon, so that
xmlcatalog files (e.g. for DocBook) can be later used by entity-resolver.
Solve Catch-22 when xmlcatalog files declare their DTD.

author: crossley
msg: Explain that they can use other DTDs for their project.
